headerDisplay:
[homebridge-myq2](https://github.com/hjdhjd/homebridge-myq2) is a Homebridge plugin to bring HomeKit support to myQ-enabled devices such as smart garage door openers. Compatible brands include Liftmaster, Chamberlain, and Craftsman among others.

The [myQ compatibility check tool](https://www.myq.com/myq-compatibility) can be used to check if your device may be compatible.

See the [Feature Options](https://github.com/hjdhjd/homebridge-myq2#feature-options) section in the documentation for a complete list of features that can be enabled or disabled.
footerDisplay: For additional help please see the [homebridge-myq2](https://github.com/hjdhjd/homebridge-myq2) project site.

activeRefreshDuration.title: Active Refresh Duration
activeRefreshDuration.description:
Default: 300
Duration in seconds to use the Active Refresh Interval to query for additional device state changes.

activeRefreshInterval.title: Active Refresh Interval
activeRefreshInterval.description:
Default: 3
Refresh interval in seconds to use once device state changes are detected in order to ensure we quickly detect any additional device changes (e.g. a door opening or closing) for Active Refresh Duration seconds.

appId.title: myQ Application Identifier
appId.description:
Default: none (use the builtin appId)
Override the builtin myQ application identifier when connecting to the myQ API. This setting is only useful when myQ API changes occur and this plugin hasn't been updated.
Changing this setting without understanding the implications will result in being unable to connect to the myQ API and potentially being denylisted from the myQ API servers. This setting is intended to be used as a last resort when sudden myQ API changes occur. Use with extreme care.

debug.title: Debug Logging
debug.description:
Default: false
Logging verbosity for debugging purporses.

email.title: myQ Username
email.description: Email address used for your myQ account.

name.title: Name
name.description:
Default: myQ
The name you would like to assign to this plugin primarily for logging purposes.

password.title: myQ Password
password.description: Password used for your myQ account.

refreshInterval.title: Refresh Interval
refreshInterval.description:
Default: 12
Normal refresh interval of myQ device status from the myQ API in seconds.

layout.title: Advanced Settings (Optional)
layout.help: Configure advanced features such as debugging.

items.description:
Available options (one option per entry):
  • Hide.serialnumber to hide the gateway (and all associated openers) or individual opener from being shown in HomeKit.
  • Show.serialnumber to force a gateway (and all associated openers) or opener to be shown in HomeKit.

Click here for Feature Options documentation
